mapper.select: SELECT A.*, (CASE WHEN TO_DATE(B.END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') - SYSDATE >= 0 THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END) AS ISRENTAL FROM BOOK A, RENTAL B WHERE A.BOOK_ID = B.BOOK_ID(+) AND A.BOOK_ID = #{param1}
SELECT * FROM BOOK WHERE UPPER(TITLE) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{param1}) || '%'
